articles.title: Margaret Boden, Philosopher of Artificial Intelligence, Dies at 88
articles.summary: A cognitive scientist, she used the language of computers to explore the nature of human thought and creativity, offering prescient insights about A.I.
articles.translated_title: Margaret Boden, Philosopher of Artificial Intelligence, Dies at 88
articles.translated_summary: A cognitive scientist, she used the language of computers to explore the nature of human thought and creativity, offering prescient insights about A.I.

articles.title: Meta’s superintelligence dream team will be management challenge of the century
articles.summary: Meta Platforms Inc. is spending a fortune to assemble the brightest minds in artificial intelligence. Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg may want to note: Research suggests that packing a team with too much genius can backfire.
articles.translated_title: Meta’s superintelligence dream team will be management challenge of the century
articles.translated_summary: Meta Platforms Inc. is spending a fortune to assemble the brightest minds in artificial intelligence. Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg may want to note: Research suggests that packing a team with too much genius can backfire.

articles.title: Tiger cub hedge fund Coatue Management unveils new position in Oracle, doubles down on AI buildout
articles.summary: The investor doubled down on key artificial intelligence beneficiaries such as Nvidia and Microsoft as the tech rally came back with a fury in the second quarter.
articles.translated_title: Tiger cub hedge fund Coatue Management unveils new position in Oracle, doubles down on AI buildout
articles.translated_summary: The investor doubled down on key artificial intelligence beneficiaries such as Nvidia and Microsoft as the tech rally came back with a fury in the second quarter.

articles.title: Apple Needs to Do an AI Acquisition, Says Dan Ives
articles.summary: Wedbush Head of Tech Research Dan Ives says Apple is so far behind in artificial intelligence development that it needs to make an acquisition to catch up. Ives joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on “Bloomberg Tech.” (Source: Bloomberg)
articles.translated_title: Apple Needs to Do an AI Acquisition, Says Dan Ives
articles.translated_summary: Wedbush Head of Tech Research Dan Ives says Apple is so far behind in artificial intelligence development that it needs to make an acquisition to catch up. Ives joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on “Bloomberg Tech.” (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: Apple Looks to Regain Mojo With AI Robots, Lifelike Siri
articles.summary: Apple is plotting an artificial intelligence comeback with new devices, including robots and a lifelike version of Siri. Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman discusses the iPhone maker’s plans with Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Tech." (Source: Bloomberg)
articles.translated_title: Apple Looks to Regain Mojo With AI Robots, Lifelike Siri
articles.translated_summary: Apple is plotting an artificial intelligence comeback with new devices, including robots and a lifelike version of Siri. Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman discusses the iPhone maker’s plans with Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on "Bloomberg Tech." (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: Man who asked ChatGPT about cutting out salt from his diet was hospitalized with hallucinations
articles.summary: A 60-year-old man spent three weeks being treated at a hospital after replacing table salt with sodium bromide following consultation with a popular artificial intelligence chatbot.
articles.translated_title: Man who asked ChatGPT about cutting out salt from his diet was hospitalized with hallucinations
articles.translated_summary: A 60-year-old man spent three weeks being treated at a hospital after replacing table salt with sodium bromide following consultation with a popular artificial intelligence chatbot.

articles.title: 3 charts that show Palantir's astronomical growth since going public
articles.summary: The artificial intelligence-powered software company's cofounders include renowned venture capitalist Peter Thiel and current CEO Alex Karp.
articles.translated_title: 3 charts that show Palantir's astronomical growth since going public

articles.title: Right-wing activist Robby Starbuck joins Meta as an AI advisor focused on ‘bias’
articles.summary: Conservative influencer and anti-DEI agitator Robby Starbuck has a new role: advising tech giant Meta on how to prevent “bias” in its artificial intelligence systems.

articles.title: AI startup Cohere valued at $6.8 billion in latest fundraise, appoints new executives
articles.summary: Cohere was valued at $6.8 billion after its latest $500 million funding round, as the artificial intelligence startup moves to expand its market share in a highly competitive industry.
